title: The Music album: continental melodies
brief_description: A selection of three song and dance performances: 1. “Sombrerita Mia” performed by Carmelita. 2. “Russian Revels” performed by The Lucky Girls. 3. “Brazil” performed by maria Del Ray and Raoul martinez and Milo Menendez and his Orchestra.
